agent_utterance: Three tiny steps tonight to support you: 1) drink one glass (about 250 ml) of cold water now. 2) if cravings arise within the next hour, choose one pre-portioned BED-safe snack (about 100–150 kcal) and eat slowly for 15–20 chews, using a timer to pace yourself. 3) log your craving, snack, and mood in the app within 10 minutes of deciding. If no craving hits, log a quick 'no snack' to maintain accountability. Optional: use a 2-minute box breathing exercise if cravings spike.
